org.mongodb.morphia.mapping.cache

Interface EntityCacheFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEntityCacheFactory

    public interface EntityCacheFactory
    Factory for entity caches.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityCache createCache()
      Called for every query.

    • Method Detail

      • createCache

        EntityCache createCache()
        Called for every query. The cache is used during queries for by-id lookups.
        Returns:
        the cache
